meanings.sent1: Farmers grow oilseeds to produce cooking oil.
meanings.sent2: Oilseeds are used in various food products like salad dressings.
meanings.sent3: The oilseeds whispered to each other, 'We will soon become delicious oil!'
meanings.sent4: In the kitchen, oilseeds are like tiny treasure chests full of golden liquid.
meanings.sent5: The sunflower oilseeds glistened in the sunlight, promising rich flavor.

meanings.definition: Seeds from which oil is extracted.
meanings.sent1: Oilseeds are crushed to release the valuable oils within.
meanings.sent2: Many countries import oilseeds to meet their oil production needs.
meanings.sent3: The oilseeds held a protest, demanding fair treatment in the oil extraction process.
meanings.sent4: To the machines, oilseeds are like little factories producing liquid gold.
meanings.sent5: The scent of freshly crushed oilseeds filled the air with a pleasant aroma.
